title: Notable & Quotable: Pro-Choice No More
sub_head: ‘That’s hurtful to people who’ve had abortions. It implies that abortion isn’t a good thing.’
body: From a Feb. 10, 2021, blog post by the Planned Parenthood Advocacy Fund of Massachusetts. Politico reported on Thursday that the House Pro-Choice Caucus issued a memo to staff describing the word “choice” as “harmful language”:
